@MattShieldsDev @Netlify Richer controls over the redirects API is a good one. FWIW, I'd urge caution with case sensitivity in URLs. URLs permit it outside of domain names, but it can introduce usability and discoverability issues. Being case-insensitive is more robust. Good notes here though. Thanks!
